properties.name: hangout.loki-server.url
properties.description: URL of Grafana Loki server. It is used to ship logs for observability

properties.name: hangout.tempo-server.url
properties.description: URL of Grafana Tempo server. It is used to ship traces for observability

properties.name: hangout.log.path
properties.description: Log Directory where ogs will be permanently stored

properties.name: hangout.kafka.topic
properties.description: The kafka topic to produce event in, to indicate new multimedia content is available for processing

properties.name: hangout.auth-service.url
properties.description: URL of auth service to authorize access tokens

properties.name: hangout.storage-service.path
properties.description: The shared path in which we will place the uploaded multimedia files for further processing
